title: Textile, ca. 1870
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: moire; embossing; warp-faced plain weave with supplementary warp patterning on the front in plain weave, or 5-harness satin and free floating on the back.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 106 x 69.5 cm (41 3/4 x 27 3/8 in.)
description: Orange-red ribbed silk moiré, with design of yellow plumes arranged in two vertical columns.

Textile, ca. 1870.
ca. 1870. Medium: silk
